scripts.lint: yarn workspace jan lint && yarn workspace @janhq/web lint
scripts.test-local: yarn lint && yarn build:test && yarn test
scripts.dev:electron: yarn copy:assets && yarn workspace jan dev
scripts.dev:web:standalone: concurrently "yarn workspace @janhq/web dev" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && rsync -av --prune-empty-dirs --include '*/' --include 'dist/***' --include 'package.json' --include 'tsconfig.json' --exclude '*' ./extensions/ web/.next/static/extensions/"
scripts.dev:tauri: yarn build:icon && yarn copy:assets:tauri && tauri dev
scripts.build:tauri:linux:win32: yarn download:bin && yarn install:cortex && yarn build:icon && yarn copy:assets:tauri && yarn tauri build --verbose
scripts.build:tauri:darwin: yarn install:cortex && yarn build:icon && yarn copy:assets:tauri && yarn tauri build --verbose --target universal-apple-darwin
scripts.build:core: cd core && yarn build && yarn pack
scripts.build:electron: yarn copy:assets && yarn workspace jan build
scripts.build:extensions: rimraf ./pre-install/*.tgz || true && yarn workspace @janhq/core build && cd extensions && yarn install && yarn workspaces foreach -Apt run build:publish
scripts.build:test: yarn copy:assets && yarn workspace @janhq/web build && cpx "web/out/**" "electron/renderer/" && yarn workspace jan build:test
scripts.build:publish: yarn copy:assets && yarn build:web && yarn workspace jan build:publish
scripts.dev:joi: yarn workspace @janhq/joi install && yarn workspace @janhq/joi dev
